website_summaries.verdict: With styling based on one of Fila's top shoes but with a high top design. And with more comfort and durability.
pros: Many use them as training shoes, but they're tough enough that some use them as motorcycle boots
Comes in a variety of colors
Leather and synthetic uppers, rubber sole
cons: May run small, so consider this when sizing

customer_reviews.title: Fila 4 life!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Filas! They are my new favorite shoes to wear. I own many high end stylish shoes but these are special the remind me of the 90s in a special way. I highly recommend these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Kid Corinthia

customer_reviews.title: My only criticism is that if you like a soft insole
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use as a light-weight motorcycle boot. I was impressed with the quality of the leather and the support offered. They are well made. My only criticism is that if you like a soft insole, these are more typical dress of a shoe, If you intend to spend significant time on your feet. you will need to insert your favorite insoles in these sneaks.
customer_reviews.author: Geldscheisser

customer_reviews.title: ••••• The Best of The Best •••••
customer_reviews.text: A+ ( Best purchase / Best Price ever from Amazon) Fabulous !!!!
customer_reviews.author: brian deangelo

customer_reviews.title: Minor defect/wrong color/ slight satisfaction
customer_reviews.text: "Please note that I have received the wrong color of Filas!" Now that's out of the way, I like the design and the comfort of these Filas. The ankle strap on the shoe gives me extra ankle support and the inside is very cushy. Overall four out of five star shoe. The only flaw of these Filas is that they're not the ones I ordered and there happens to be a smudge of black ink on the white detail of the shoe. It's really small but if I was to step in the light someone might see it.
customer_reviews.author: 🔥 Hot Shopper D🔥

customer_reviews.title: Nice solid shoe, but they run smaller than normal.
customer_reviews.text: They have a great feel from the extra padding, but I reordered 1/2 size larger and will try those.
customer_reviews.author: Hank G.

customer_reviews.title: Really like them.  May get another pair.  Reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Perfect for riding my motorcycle and nice for walking. Not much tread, but appears to be made of grippy material with some strategically placed treads. Fit was just right, US 11.5 or 45 EU. Width adequate for my wide foot. Just a little hard to slip into, but may break in with time.
customer_reviews.author: Steve K. Close

customer_reviews.title: finally I found the hi-cut workout shoes that are not expensive
customer_reviews.text: I used to purchase rebook Hi-cut shoes for my aerobic exercise. But that has become expensive. This is the half price of that. And the best thing is that it weighs very light, and that it supports ankles , and that it makes me feel safe to jump. It is very comfortable. I wanted to choose the red color one, but it costs $10 more compared to the blue one.\ So I chose the blue.
customer_reviews.author: yoshijiro fukuchi

customer_reviews.title: Good For The Price
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find a good leather athletic shoe these days. PROS: Median price point, well made (for China). I am a 'C' width on the narrow side, shoe fits well. CONS: Shoe strings are thin and cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Murphy

customer_reviews.title: The size was same but the shoe varied from last pair, to small.
customer_reviews.text: They are a comfortable shoe. I purchased a like pair months ago, BUT they fell apart in the sole after 6 months of wearing part time. So comfortable, with the high ankle support, that I ordered another pair anyway. But this size 8.5 was far to small. Sadly, I sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Narrow and Scuffed
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking shoes, no doubt. Using the companies sizing chart provided, it informed me that these would be just fine for wide feet (not very wide which was the other option on the chart). I got the box, opened it, looked at the shoes and the left shoe has a gray scuff/color mark going across 3 of the 5 vent/air holes on the top or furthest from toes, line. When I put on the shoes they were tight; hope they will stretch.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest B. Foss

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad sneaker just wish it was cut to a true size
customer_reviews.text: Not quite the Tru-Fit arch was a little too tight had to loosen up the shoestrings quite a bit toe area ( big toe ) was a bit snug.
customer_reviews.author: Jonny J

customer_reviews.title: The fit on all of these Fila Men's f-13 are ...
customer_reviews.text: The fit on all of these Fila Men's f-13 are suspect so order a size up! The toe box is where the problem is! The shoes are the right size as far as the sole length on the sole is concerned. But the top leather part stops too soon before the end of the sole, throwing the fit off on these.
customer_reviews.author: Shine Smith

customer_reviews.title: You cannot beat this price. is a must-have!
customer_reviews.text: The sneakers for the price are great! I recommend them they look good and they're great. It reminds me of my 90's days when I was a young buck.😂😂😂 Rob Base. it takes two to make the thing go right.😂😂😂😂
customer_reviews.author: johnny coco

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: The shoes had glue on the top, both the right & left shoe(s). The right shoe had glue on the side; poorly made! Obviously these shoes did not pass quality control and should have been rejected, and not sold! I would have personally returned the shoes, but since I bought them for my boyfriend, and he doesn't like to return anything, he is now wearing shoes with visible glue on them! I will never buy from this company again!
customer_reviews.author: Kristy McMahan

customer_reviews.title: Like something you’d find on the floor at marshals
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap and they are huge. Not worth more than 30 I would of paid 15. They are like something you’d find in a pile at Marshall’s or something. That’s the quality appeal status of the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Aldo

customer_reviews.title: Nice Throwbacks!
customer_reviews.text: Sweet old-school FILAS! The fit and construction these blue kicks are screaming, takes me way back definitely recommend and would buy again in in fact Im going to be buying the boot style for winter👍
customer_reviews.author: Inspector Danny

customer_reviews.title: Prefect to wear with jeans
customer_reviews.text: Everything about the shoes I purchased was fine. But there was a little nick by the toe and it looked like someone tried to cover it up with white-out. But it wasn't that bad and I highly doubt other purchases will have that problem.. Besides that, it's a great and stylish shoe. Perfect to wear with jeans.
customer_reviews.author: james shough

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I love theses sneakers they are comfortable and the are throwbacks I use to wears theses back in the day when I was going to school growing up when I was a youngin I wear them for work I had all colors so far I had the red ones the navy blue one now I got the blacks one and when I’m done with theses I’m going to get the white ones you won’t know until you try them on if you don’t like them and they are not comfortable just return them
customer_reviews.author: Alondus Jones

customer_reviews.title: They are good price .But they are made cheap in the sole they give out in the heal & toe
customer_reviews.text: The bottom of the rear of the shoe has all ready started to come apart .This is the 3 pair i have ordered & all have had the same issue .
customer_reviews.author: Wj Strutt

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy if you have a wide foot
customer_reviews.text: Nothing against the sell or brand but the show isnt made for men with wide feet. I ended up giving the pair away because they just don't fit. Which is sad because the show itself is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Travis T

customer_reviews.title: Decent for price
customer_reviews.text: This shoe came with a mild imperfection on the bottom of the shoe. It looks like a small hall or lump on the bottom of she. Otherwise shoe was great.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow
customer_reviews.text: The shoe was too narrow had to take the sole out for perfect fit, didn’t want to send them back husband love them
customer_reviews.author: kimberly n.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Good looking, comfortable sneakers at a good price. I like Fila's and have found that they hold up well over time. They generally run a bit small, e.g. I wear a 12 in Nike's but a 13 in Fila's.
customer_reviews.author: Craig R.

customer_reviews.title: Are these shipped brand new or use instead, One pair of mines had toe prints
customer_reviews.text: It looks like the right shoe been worn and I payed for Brand New shoes. The right one has toe prints in it!! I ordered three pair of these all together but this last one was a replacement for a larger size. I order almost everyday from Amazon and I'm very disappointed. I Love mines but My Husband fears these ones being they look worn. At this point I'm exhausted.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Mason

customer_reviews.title: Nostalgia at it's finest
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes as they take me back to the 90's. Only knock is that eventually you have change the inserts after a few wears
customer_reviews.author: Jaron

customer_reviews.title: Defective manufacturing.
customer_reviews.text: After less than 2 months of just light gym training, the buckle that holds the velcro ankle strap broke and the velcro strap ripped off from where it was attached to the shoe. I have another pair of similar Filas that are several years old and still holding up. I saw some reports that this brand used to be good but now made by another company in China. No stars! Beware!
customer_reviews.author: stephen murray

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed and provides excellent support.
customer_reviews.text: The shoe provides exceptional ankle support. Overall the shoe meets the manufacturer promise of a high quality product and the price is reasonable. I
customer_reviews.author: Stephen A. Szadek

customer_reviews.title: well made and great style
customer_reviews.text: For years I only bought KSwiss but FILA (to me) is a better and well-made shoe. Very happy with this purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good and retro
customer_reviews.text: I wanted an inexpensive pair of sneakers for work that would match my scrubs.... these worked and they fit fairly well.

product_meta.title: Fila Men's F-13v Lea/syn Fashion Sneakers
product_meta.description:
Fila has reached back into the archives and brought back this timeless heritage training shoe. The styling, material and colors make the look fashionable and contemporary. A true inspiration combining function and fashion.

Fila began in 1911, in the small alpine town of Biella, Italy, a place renowned for manufacturing the world's finest textiles, and weaving fabrics with impeccable quality, true innovation and extraordinary beauty. Born of the city and its traditions, Fila is inexorably derived from Biella's dedication to artistry, luxury and elegance. This is our birthright, it's in our soul, and it defines our future. We continue to enrich the athletic experience by improving comfort and performance with Italian design, quality craftsmanship and refined materials. There is no feeling quite as luxurious as that of playing in Fila, and that is the reason for our existence. We create what is desired, not what is necessary. Not just enough, but more than you need. This is Fila.
feature_bullets: Your sneaker game will always be fresh with the FILA® F-13V Leather/Synthetic!
Lace-up closure with a hook-and-loop strap.

Soft textile lining. Lightly padded footbed. Rubber outsole. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 1 lb 3 oz Product measurements were taken using size 12, width D - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
